name: Tiny Town
reviews:
I haven't been to Tiny Town since I was a kid, and my son and I were super bored yesterday, so I thought, why not??  

It took me back to when I was a kid,...
Another one of these odd Colorado "historical" obsessions. As a Colorado native who was born here and lived a majority of my life here, I have to say that I...
My 10 year old son and daughter loved it, especially the tiny buildings they could go into. They didn't play at the playground, mainly cause it was swarmed...

name: Denver Adventures - Zipline Tours
reviews: Wear layers!!!! A lot a lot.. maybe I'm just always cold but I wish I would've wore even more layers! Super fun and exhilarating adventure through the...

It would be tough to hurt yourself, and plenty exciting. 

Safe and exciting way to explore the trees and parkland of Colorado. 

35 miles from the airport,...
Just did the 6 line tour. My boyfriend and I only remember Abby'a name (we are jerks I know). There was also Tom? Maybe? Some kid called one Vin Diesel,...

name: Children's Museum of Denver at Marsico Campus
reviews: Children's museum is such a fun and unique venue to host your event! Think outside the box, and you can do fun fundraisers, weddings and even corporate...
We had our wedding and ceremony here at the skyline gallery and it was amazing! Ryan Ting was the coordinator and contact for the museum, and Ryan along...
Okay so the place is super cool and fun, but it's 14 per person. So to take my five year old, it was 42 for him, me and my husband...that's expensive! Also...

name: Denver Art Museum
reviews: Thanks to the calling from the painter gods, I was blessed with an once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to see all of Claude Monet's paintings at this exquisite...
The only reason I can't rate DAM higher is because a large portion of it was closed for remodeling when I visited. There were four floors open in the newer...
This review is NOT for the Monet works themselves that were being exhibited. Rather, it is about rude customer service and the pathetic gift shop at the end...

name: Blue Sushi Sake Grill
reviews: Omg this place is to die for!!!!!! They have a salmon plate that is drizzled in truffle sauce and it melts in your mouth. Everything we ordered was...

Solid spot for sushi on Denver's famous 16th St. mall.  I enjoyed the atmosphere and food, not one of my faves but good enough. 

Not a whole lot to report...
Blue Sushi is one of my go to places to escape the office for lunch. Great lunch specials, but their full menu is also available (thursdays they have a...

name: Belleview Park
reviews: Another favorite park! Tennis courts... Basketball courts... Lots of grassy areas/trees. Big Plus are the Playgrounds! If you have kiddos that are climbers,...
There should be more reviews for this park. All 5s. The only drawbacks are that it shares parking with the water park next door, and it's on Belleview - a...
This review is short and sweet! What more can you say about a park then...relaxing and fun! Mom and Dad relaxing while the kids play in the...

name: Axe Whooping
reviews:
Checked this place out for the first time today after wanting to go down for several months. 

It's a beautiful facility that is open, spacious and quieter...
I came here with my coworkers and other partners as a team builder. We had the place to ourselves as it was early and they opened just for us. The...
Our team came here for some pre-happy hour fun without really knowing what to expect and, I've got to say, this was such a blast! The staff was very...

name: Cheesman Park
reviews: Look no further for an urban park in Denver. Surrounds with trees, buildings, downtown and mountain views. The park is centrally located is the...
Cheesman is my favorite Denver park. I'm prejudiced--if I go down the staircase behind my townhouse and open the gate, I'm standing in the park and just...
Cheesman Park is so convenient to where I like to stay when I am visiting Denver. The park has lots of energy with people walking, twirling fire batons,...

name: Cherry Cricket
reviews:
There are times when you want a good burger and nothing else will suffice. Even if that means calling in an order and picking up. 

That was my big Saturday...
Miss the in person experience but to-go here is a good option. Got a lil cricket burger with american cheese and frings. Did not disappoint. Ordering and...
I am in Denver to see my bf and I found this place online. We went there and I have to say this was the best hamburger I have EVER eaten. It was phenomenal!...

name: Work & Class
reviews: I want to cry out of happiness because the food and drinks at Work & Class were phenomenal. I came here with a group of friends, and it was the perfect...
Truly grateful to dine. I came here for dinner last Friday night with my sisters. At that time, the place was pretty full and much occupied by a lot of...

I had an unexpectedly awesome time here. We walked past this place, and it seemed busy so we thought we would give it a go.

I thought it would be expensive...

name: Platform Strength
reviews:
Great gym. Strong community. Amazing coaches. Platform makes my day better regardless of the workout :)

Highly recommend.
Do your own thing, do a group thing, do a coached thing...do it all?! You've got options, and if that's overwhelming, they offer a free week for you to...
I've been waiting a long time for a place like this to open! I've never seen a gym that has classes that are super focused on the barbell and heavy lifting...

name: Water World
reviews: I came to Colorado for a wedding but I always make sure to make some time for a waterpark or theme park. I decided on this place because I heard so many...
Your typical Water World experience happens here. Lots of rides and slides to choose from and most are worth the wait. However, take note that most lines...

I took my children to Water World on September 2. 
While swimming in the wave pool my son and I were pulled out to far. The lifeguards  were not watching...

name: Museum of Contemporary Art Denver
reviews: Three floors of gallery space in a unique floor plan that allows room for wall space, open areas and interesting vistas - interior and gazing out into...
I'd give this a 2.5. While there is so much potential for this museum, it was a disappointment to my family. The space is either nearly empty or far too...
I'm particular about my art museums, my taste trends more contemporary but I really love sculpture. While there is little to no sculpture at the current...

name: City of Denver
reviews: This is a great city. I could definitely see myself living here one day and totally get why people love living here. It's a mild weather all year in the...
Several moons ago I got real tired of my home state of Florida. I needed a change and had always been fascinated by Denver and was craving cold weather. I...

Ahh, Denver--At last!

I finally made it to the High Mile state and honestly, this has to be the BEST state I've been to so far. Like, I'm honestly thinking...

name: Class Axe Throwing
reviews: We went here for a team-building activity on a Tuesday afternoon. For the first 2 hours, we had the whole place to ourself which was awesome. I could see...

name: The Hornet
reviews: In recent years I haven't been too impressed with the food at The Hornet, which is centrally located in the thriving SOBO/Baker neighborhood. So when...

Not sure why I haven't ventured here sooner! I thought it was a bar due to location, but my friend suggested we have dinner there.

Still being on a health...

I just found my go-to, pre-show grub pub on S. Broadway!

The Hornet has been open since '95 and in my opinion, will be cranking out delicious food and...

name: Root Down - Denver International Airport
reviews: its hard to find good quality food options in any airport, let alone vegan options. Well Root Down (a staple in Denver) has a location in DIA and it is...

This salad was recommended to me from the server and I have to say.. it was not that great.

If you are obsessed with beets and you are into sweeter salads,...
This is one of the best airport food options I've seen for people with food allergies. 100% recommend! Most of the menu can be made gluten-free or vegan and...

name: Forest Room 5
reviews:
Forest Room 5. 5 stars. This outdoorsy themed bar was just the spot to top off our wilderness adventure. 

It was a nice night, so we enjoyed our bevvys in...
Quirky cool bar. They have indoor and outdoor seating in a low lit environment. There is an array of odd furniture that makes the place quite unique....
Ah, Forest Room 5, what a funky and unique spot, if only your staff were the tiniest bit nicer.  The bar has taxidermized animals, mini dioramas, hidden...

name: City Park
reviews: No matter the time of year, a stroll through City Park makes the day just a little bit better. Kind of like a glass of milk - it does a body...

Beautiful park to take a walk, boat ride or hear a concert. Lots of open space for picnics and lounging. 

I have only been here to walk so I don't know...
City Park is large park within the city to Denver. If you need to get away from the hustle and bustle for a while without going too far, this is a good...

name: Hops & Pie
reviews:
Little spot that gets bumpin on a Friday night!
We chose to make our own pie. It has a Very good crust and all the toppings were plentiful as well- we chose...

This place is SO good!! We came on a Friday night around 8pm and were seated within 10 minutes. They had a good selection of beer on draft and in a can and...

name: City Sessions Denver
reviews: So we set-up 2 months in advance with Goldie, but endured nothing but calamity at the airport and missed our tour!!! She's still 5 star in our book... She...

This review is looooooonnnggg overdue. However that speaks volumes to the service I received when I took my tour of wonderful Colorado with Goldie. 
Her...

name: Denver Zoo Lights
reviews:
Thank you so much for the low sensory night at Zoo Lights! 12.31.19
As an adult with multiple brain injuries,  I really enjoyed being able to enjoy this...
It can be a little sad seeing the animals are in cages at night, but the lights really are beautiful. Seeing some of the animals is optional. I recommend...
So glad we decided to do this on New Year's Eve. We were on a ski trip in Colorado & had Denver as our home base and for people like us that don't really...

name: Historic Downtown Golden
reviews: This town is quite cute. Unfortunately, it was raining when we visited so we couldn't fully experience the place. From what we saw it was awesome with many...
No trip to Colorado is complete without visiting Golden.  The historic downtown area has a wide variety of shops, restaurants and places to enjoy a cold...
An awesome little downtown for an afternoon stroll with all the obligatory tourist shops; candy stores, tee-shirt shops, restaurants, bars.... Something for...

name: Centennial Center Park
reviews: Centennial did a great job with this park. There's plenty of space here with a giant playground and even a splash pad going in the summer. My favorite part...
This is the flagship playground for the South metro area and boasts the largest sprayground in town, a huge climbing net, a stage for events, and a young...
This place probably has the best splash area around. Gets busy quickly. The playground is enormous. Great place for parties. They have events here all...

name: Colorado State Government: Capitol Building
reviews: Early in the morning, my mom and I visited the one mile above sea level stairs, and decided to go into the building and look at it. We found out there were...

Tips!

1) Be prepared to go through a metal detector
2)The last tour ended at 3PM
3)The stairs to the top of the dome closed at 4PM.
4) Bring some quarters...

name: Citron Bistro
reviews: One of our favorite "go to" places when we are craving greek. We love the gyro platter. Salads are amazing too. All the ingredients are fresh, homemade, and...

Yummy....delicious heathy food....for your tummy! Greek meets Mexican (?) cousine and conceptually procreates some of the best food you can find!

My bestie...

Food: Delicious, Service: Bad.

name: Film on the Rocks
reviews: Film on the Rocks is def one of my FAVORITE summer happenings! A local band (sometimes even a comedy act) and a movie in the best outdoor venue for a mere...
Of course growing up in the 80's and 90's - we had to go see Heathers! Film On The Rocks! Always a gamble with Mother Nature, and last this movie was no...

name: Grand Adventures
reviews:
Putt Putt was the business! Great guide and a super nice guy. We did a two hour guided tour. I could have gone for two more if I wasn't so damn hungry! 

We...

Very disappointed with this company. 
1. The snow mobile tour left 20 minutes late
2. The whole trail was surrounded by trees with very little sight...

name: Vesta
reviews: Vesta is my favorite place in the city for a special occasion dinner or nice date night. The food is exceptional and the service is AMAZING. I first went...
Love love love the ambiance of Vesta. My boyfriend and I came here for a nice date night that happened to fall on Valentine's Day. The restaurant was full...

Vesta. Is. Amazing. 
Really, that's all you need to know, but I'll divulge a little further.

My husband and I came to Vesta for the first time on a Monday...

name: Puzzle Effect - Denver
reviews: WOW! Puzzle Effect (Formerly Denver Escape Room) is a WONDERFUL place to do escape rooms. I am a veteran. After the first time, I was hooked and couldn't...

name: Rioja
reviews: I knew that the other restaurants by this group (Bistro Vendome, Ultreia, Stoic & Genuine, Euclid Hall) have been great, so when I saw that they had "feasts...
Even if you can't go to Rioja during the COVID stay at home order, Rioja is continuing to crush delicious food (and presentation!) with their to go orders....
I gotta admit, Rioja is in a perfect spot to have an ostentatious happy hour. It's located on Larimer square, so after happy hour, you can go strolling...

name: Boondocks Northglenn
reviews: We had a good time here but not without problems. The timeout feature used in the bowling scoreboards makes no sense at all. We bowled at a normal pace and...

Not that great. All arcade games at this location cost $. My gaming-wiz of a 7 year old played for 15 min and didn't get a single ticket in any game. 

The...

name: 88 Drive In Theatre
reviews: What a gem!! We had a great experience here. We showed up roughly 30 minutes before the first showing on a weeknight and we got a great spot and never had a...

This is one of the last drive-ins in the country and I think we should totally keep it - however, there are definitely areas of improvement. 

PRICE
+ It's...

name: The Clue Room
reviews: My family and I had a blast here! We had researched several options in the area and this was by far the best price and best experience! We called ahead of...

I had a blast! I had never tried a clue or escape room, but it's all about keeping an open and curious mind and encouraging your team. 

The event took an...
Decided to come here when looking for an activity to do together as a group on a gloomy day. We were able to book in advance a few hours before our time...

name: Sloan's Lake Park
reviews: I agree with some of the others...do NOT, I repeat, do NOT use the restrooms.  I have never seen a women's restroom so disgusting.  No TP was the least of...

Really good to walk/run around or bike or skate... whatever your mode of transportation may be at the time, yes the park is great for this reason! 

The...

name: Unser Karting & Events
reviews: Unser is a fun place! If you've never been, go! You need a valid driver's license and required to watch a safety video beforehand. My hubby and I went for...

Been wanting to do this for the longest time! The experience was AWESOME the karts are so fast and everyone is very friendly. 

Basically just a heads up we...

name: Scratch Burrito & Happy Tap
reviews:
Here's the thing about Scratch, you have to get the right stuff:

Amazing breakfast burrito for just $5. Served all day. Get it for dinner. 
Wings are top...
This was my second time going to scratch burrito and the first time was a much better experience. They have a great looking menu, and I decided to go with...
I've been to scratch burrito once before and I loved it the first time so I was pretty excited to go back. It is the perfect spot for a quick, easy and...

name: The Clocktower Cabaret
reviews: Sooooo much fun!!!! Great atmosphere and wonderful performers! Came for a surprise birthday for a lady on my hockey team and she had a great time being on...

Me and my colleagues were in town for a conference and wanted to do something fun and different. We found the Thursday night burlesque show and were...

name: Mayan Theatre
reviews: Great little theater located in Southwest broadway. This was my first experience at The Mayan Theater. The ticket booth outside was charming and walking in...
I like this little nostalgic theater a lot. While, at times I have to go to the more commercialized theaters, I really do prefer the smaller ones. It's just...

This theater is phenomenal! I love art deco. I m not an expert, but this theater seems to be well preserved! 

I loved the fact that one of the managers...

name: Epic Escape Game
reviews: Took the family for a birthday good time. Had a blast, did the dorm of doom and really enjoyed the puzzle. we did not finish, it was very well done and...
Participated in their Fantasy Escape Room - "The Assassin" over the weekend and had a really fun time!  We had one other friend remote in and Madison from...
Andrew was a super fun host and helped us understand the game rules! We chose the wizard room and were all pleasantly surprised! My family of 6 tackles the...

name: Nick's Garden Center & Farm Market
reviews: Love this olace. They have everything. I think people work here for free as it seems like people are willing to give their day iff to do what they love!!
Just moved into a new apartment so was looking to load up on some new plants  and let me just say love the variety that they have here it's like nothing...
They have literally every plant you can imagine lol. It's a huge space densely packed with all kinds of plants! Prices are on the higher side but they look...

name: The Infinite Monkey Theorem
reviews:
I think I like this place. Super cute wine bar with not many choices but definitely a good selection of wines. 
If you're a beer aficionados they have a...
Writing this from the great quarantine of 2020, so this time it was just a pick up to-go order, but that doesn't change the fact that TIMT has a good...

the wine is amazing, not a lot of options but thats because everything they serve is made there!

the vibe is amazing. we went during winter and the inside...

name: Shells & Sauce
reviews: Came here for Valentine's Day and booked thru open table-very convenient! I was about 20 min late for my reservation but low and behold they were still so...
Shells & Sauce get a 5 star review simply for the their BBQ shrimp and grits brunch dish. The dish was simply amazing. It had a slight sweet flavor and the...
I've been coming to Shells & Sauce for a few years and it is always a treat. This most recent outing was an 8 person dinner so thank goodness for...

name: Cherry Creek Arts Festival
reviews: Dealing with difficulty things in life can take over in ones spiritual mind. That's why the art festival in Cherry Creek shopping center can certainly...
The Cheery Creek Arts Festival is the premiere arts festival in Denver.  It takes place in early July and includes blocks and blocks of artists from...
A little warm today but still a great time. Awesome art, food vendors and restaurants (slinging terrific food and beverages) and the the crowd couldn't be...

name: Dangerous Theatre
reviews: This is a hidden gem! What a great venue for a small intimate crowd and such a welcoming host. She invited us in cheerfully and made a delicious breakfast....
Last night we went to see "Adulting Sucks". I didn't really know what to expect but definitely thought it would be funny. It was not really "funny" though...
We were welcomed and offered snacks and pot( oh you said pop) There was a good variety of choices both of cold or hot drinks and chips, crackers or cookies...

name: Pepsi Center
reviews:
New Year's Eve with the Colorado Avalanche and Indoor Fireworks!
What a fun way to spend New Year's Eve.
The AV's fans are very Family Friendly and the...
Came here to watch the Leafs play the Avalanche and had a great time!  Very comfortable arena with friendly fans.  Seems very family-oriented so there...
Oh Pepsi Center,  what has happened to you in the last couple years?  I understand that you're a bit high maintenance, but you could at least act as though...

name: Osteria Marco
reviews: This is my favorite restaurant in Denver. It is basement-level, but it doesn't feel cramped at all. It's a large space with high ceilings and there are...
I enjoyed my lunch experience here and would recommend for business meals or social outings. You walk downstairs where the atmosphere feels like a wine...

Business lunch

Easy to Cary on a conversation

Food was good for lunch

Wait staff was distracted / not engaged 

Seems to be more a dinner place - filling...

name: Bluebird Theater
reviews:
This is my favorite concert venue in Denver.

I've been lucky enough to see a handful of shows, including a few bands that mean a lot to me. Contrary to the...
If you've been to shows in Denver than you know. This is the best intimate venue in the entire city. Its leveled.. so the view from any part of the venue is...
This venue's security check is a breeze to get through and the staff is friendly. It looks like an old performance theater, as the venue has tiered sections...

name: Delicious Denver Food Tours
reviews: We did the Food Tour with Jill this past weekend and had some great food!  Jill was super friendly, threw in interesting facts about the city, and showed us...
We opted for Cocktails & Tastes expecting great drinks with a few nibbles on the side. Surprise! The food turned out to be as outstanding as the...
Great afternoon on a Denver Food Tour with our guide, Bonnie!  We enjoyed 6 foodie locations in the LoDo area of downtown Denver and this proved to be a fun...

name: Bonfire Burritos
reviews: I am going to give this place a five star for two very specific reasons. First, the hype... I have heard raves about this place and how much I needed to try...

Lunch review
Pros: the staff was nice and attentive. The kitchen, lobby and bathroom clean. We got our burritos fast. They had a nice little beer...
Great for breakfast but just okay for lunch. The hot is hot!! I will not be back for lunch seeing as majority of the burrito was just rice and bean filler....
